text:
Kevin Hassett, one of Trump's top economic advisers, is departing the WH soon.

His parting words to WaPo r ominous:
“I think everyone should be worried about how this is going to turn out in the end, because it’s a shock unlike anything we’ve ever seen"
https://t.co/Af1iAvmluH
